AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

params.minSharesOut: Minimum amount of shares expected to receive.
params.sharesOut: Amount of shares received by Acre.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

params.sharesOut: Amount of shares received by Acre.

params.vault: Address of the vault to add.
Address of the vault to remove.

params.minSharesOut: Minimum amount of shares to receive by Acre.
params.vault: Address of the vault to route the assets to.
Address of the vault to check.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

MinSharesError(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Thrown when amount of shares received is below the min set by caller.

NotMaintainer().notice: Reverts if the caller is not the maintainer.

VaultAlreadyAuthorized().notice: Reverts if the vault is already authorized.

VaultUnauthorized().notice: Reverts if the vault is not authorized.

ZeroAddress().notice: Reverts if the address is zero.

DepositAllocated(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Emitted when tBTC is routed to a vault.

MaintainerUpdated(address).notice: Emitted when the maintainer address is updated.

VaultAuthorized(address).notice: Emitted when a vault is authorized.

VaultDeauthorized(address).notice: Emitted when a vault is deauthorized.

acre().notice: The main Acre contract holding tBTC deposited by stakers.

authorizeVault(address).notice: Adds a vault to the list of authorized vaults.

deauthorizeVault(address).notice: Removes a vault from the list of authorized vaults.

depositToVault(address,uint256,uint256).notice: TODO: make this function internal once the allocation distribution is implementedRoutes tBTC from Acre to a vault. Can be called by the maintainer         only.

getVaults().notice: Returns the list of authorized vaults.

isVaultAuthorized(address).notice: Returns true if the vault is authorized.

vaults(uint256).notice: Authorized Yield Vaults that implement ERC4626 standard. These vaults deposit assets to yield strategies, e.g. Uniswap V3 WBTC/TBTC pool. Vault can be a part of Acre ecosystem or can be implemented externally. As long as it complies with ERC4626 standard and is authorized by the owner it can be plugged into Acre.

vaultsInfo(address).notice: Mapping of vaults to their information.

userdoc.notice: Dispatcher is a contract that routes tBTC from Acre (stBTC) to         yield vaults and back. Vaults supply yield strategies with tBTC that         generate yield for Bitcoin holders.
